generated.html:
The Project The Product The Team The Timing
FR
EN
+
FR
EN
  • The Project
  • The Product
  • The Team
  • The Timing

Take part in the creation of one of the best Organic and Vegan anti-ageing skincare creams on the market.

Whether you are a well-informed customer or an occasional user, give us your opinion and help us to develop this unique and innovative product.

Because your opinion matters

Please answer our survey

The Project

The project aims to create one of the best Organic and Vegan anti-ageing skincare creams on the market. Scheduled for launch in early 2022, this new generation cream will be sold exclusively online.

Designed and manufactured in Lyon in renowned laboratories, it will represent a perfectly balanced union of advanced research in dermatology, ease of use associated with the greatest skincare products, the best natural ingredients and respect for the planet.

  • 1
  • 2

The Project

The registered trademark "Les Laboratoires de L’Antiquaille" and the domain name "lantiquaille.com" recognise and are a tribute to the former L'Antiquaille hospital in Lyon, which was for decades the symbol of Lyon excellence in dermatology.

Nowadays, Lyon is a major continues to be a centre of excellence in this field and hosts many internationally renowned laboratories and scientific organisations. The project's ambition is to harness and build on this unique know-how to create an outstanding product which combines the best of science and nature.

  • 1
  • 2

MORE ABOUT OUR FUTURE PRODUCT

It will be one of the best Organic and Vegan anti-ageing skincare creams on the market.

1

An outstanding product
with proven efficacy

It will be the fruit of Lyon's excellence in dermatological and skincare research. This unique innovative cream will combine the proven efficacy of dermatological cares with the ease and comfort of use of the leading skincare products.

2

The perfect match
between Advanced Research
and Nature

It will be an organic-labelled cream but based on a major technological backbone, not just few natural ingredients mixed together. The search for a real, visible and long-lasting action on the main factors of skin ageing will be at the heart of the product's development.

3

An unique Organic and Vegan
cream which respects the planet
as a whole

During the development of this organic product, no animal testing nor any ingredient of animal origin will be used. Its production will aim to have as neutral an environmental impact as possible. The packaging and over-packaging used will be made of high-quality materials, but all of them will be recyclable.

4

A local product
with claimed origins
in Lyon, France

The product will be developed and produced in Lyon, France, in world class laboratories. Moreover, the project will make maximum use of locally developed active ingredients and technologies. It will be the first high-performance Organic and Vegan skincare product to clearly claim its Lyon origins.

5

Sold exclusively online

This unique product will be sold exclusively online from the beginning of 2022 under the brand name "Les Laboratoires de l'Antiquaille".
This distribution model will make it possible to reduce the number of intermediaries and enable us to offer it at a fair price.

The Team

"Les Laboratoires de L'Antiquaille" is a collaborative project. Although led by a specialist in the development and marketing of top-of-the-range cosmetic products, it will involve the both scientific community and consumers in the design and development of the brand's future products.

This is one of the reasons why this website was launched. Beyond communicating on the project, it will give you the opportunity to express your opinion and provide direct input, to test future product samples and thus participate directly in the development of the project.

  • 1
  • 2

The team

Florent Gerphagnon, the project leader, has more than 20 years of experience in cosmetics. He has worked for major players in this industry in France and abroad.

As a member of the Cosmet’in Lyon association, he well knows the key players in the dermatology and dermo-cosmetics industries in France and in the Lyon region. In addition to his background as an entrepreneur, he also worked in the field area of E-Commerce and masters has successfully mastered the latest techniques in Digital Marketing and Communication.

  • 1
  • 2

The timing

The project is in its early stages. In July 2020, the "Les Laboratoires de L'Antiquaille" project was selected to join the Lyon Start-Up Programme. This mentoring programme is run by the University of Lyon Foundation and involves the key figures and bodies in the world of entrepreneurship in Lyon and the surrounding region.

The objective plan is to begin the 12 months of development work of on this future innovative and outstanding anti-ageing cream during the first quarter of 2021 for and to target a launch in early 2022.

BECAUSE YOUR OPINION MATTERS

Don't leave before answering our survey (5 min), which will help us to further develop this unique future and innovative product.

Please answer our survey

They support us

To stay informed
Legal notice, cookies and data protection policy

Contact us

contact@lantiquaille.com
© 2020 Les Laboratoires de L’Antiquaille | Website designed by Emilie Roquet and Thomas Freger

By browsing this site, you agree to the use of cookies, to carry out anonymous statistical analysis. Read more OK

+

If you wish to stay informed about the progress of our project, receive regular information on its key milestones or subscribe to our future Newsletter, we invite you to leave us your contact details by filling in the form below.

* Information required

We remind you that we commit ourselves to using your details only internally and not to communicating them to any third party for commercial purposes. Please note that, in accordance with the current European General Data Protection Regulation (GDRP), you may request at any time that they be definitively deleted from our files by writing to us at: contact@lantiquaille.com.
